ExchangeRateId.description: The Xfuze Exchange Rate Entity Id format ExchangeRate_[sourceSystem]_[FromISO3]::[ToISO3] e.g ExchangeRate_Crew_GCP::EUR

ExchangeRateHistoryId.description: The Xfuze Exchange Rate History ID of the exchange rate over time - usually ExchangeRateId_[FromDate/FromTimestamp] e.g ExchangeRate_Crew_GCP::EUR_20230101

ExchangeRateType.description: The type of the exchange rate

EffectivePeriod.description: The period for which the FX rate is effective

FromCurrency.description: The 'from' currency object in this FX rate

ToCurrency.description: The 'to' currency object in this FX rate

Rate.description: The (explicit) rate of the period specified

RateInverse.description: The (explicit) inverse of the average rate of the period i.e (1/AverageRate)

RateCalcType.description: The calc type of the FX value / reading e.g Exact, Estimated

EstimatedRate.description: The (estimated - i.e not explicit, rather derived) rate of the period specified

EstimatedRateInverse.description: The inverse of the average rate of the period i.e (1/AverageRate)

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of the containing object/data part
